narrative.narrative: K-Mile Air is a cargo airline that is a subsidiary of Kuala Lumpur,Malaysia based Transmile Air Services, K-Mile is based at Bangkok,Thailand. It started in May 2006 and as of May 2015 had a 737-400. It flies from BKK to Singapore and Jakarta,Indonesia and Hochiminh,Vietnam (Saigon). In March 2014 Farnair Switzerland acquired 45% of its shares.
